NEON Stream Discharge Package

About

This is a data visualization app which plots and displays diferent aspects NEON's (National Ecological Observatory Network) stream discharge data. The control panel mainly panel allows users configure between NEON sites and date ranges for stream discharge data to be rendered, while the right panel displays grahical analysis of the data based on the selected date. This apps is available to be installed as a package from Github

Technologies

  • R
  • Shiny
